languages.text: Проходя между сервиторами и задерживая взгляд на каждом из них, Лорд-капитан видел{mf||а}, как подрагивали их веки, в беспокойном дыхании вздымались грудные клетки и дрожали зашитые губы, силившиеся издать хотя бы звук.

traits.locale_text: Проходя между сервиторами и задерживая взгляд на каждом из них, Лорд-капитан видел{mf||а}, как подрагивали их веки, в беспокойном дыхании вздымались грудные клетки и дрожали зашитые губы, силившиеся издать хотя бы звук.

languages.text: As the Lord Captain walked between the servitors and looked at them closely, {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} could see their eyelids fluttering, their chests heaving with restless breaths, and their sewn lips trembling as they strained to produce any sound at all.
languages.original_text: Проходя между сервиторами и задерживая взгляд на каждом из них, Лорд-капитан видел{mf||а}, как подрагивали их веки, в беспокойном дыхании вздымались грудные клетки и дрожали зашитые губы, силившиеся издать хотя бы звук.

traits.locale_text: As the Lord Captain walked between servitors and looked at them closely, {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} could see their eyelids fluttering, their chests heaving with restless breaths, and their sewn lips trembling in efforts to produce any sound at all.

As the Lord Captain walked between servitors and looked at them closely, {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} could see their eyelids fluttering, their chests heaving with restless breaths, and their sewn lips trembling in efforts to produce any sound at all.

As the Lord Captain walked between the servitors and looked at them closely, {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} could see their eyelids fluttering, their chests heaving with restless breaths, and their sewn lips trembling as they strained to produce any sound at all.

As the Lord Captain walked between the servitors and looked at them closely, {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} could see their eyelids fluttering, their chests heaving with restless breaths, and their sewn lips trembling as they strained to produce any sound at all.

As the Lord Captain walked between the servitors and looked at them closely, {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} could see their eyelids fluttering, their chests heaving with restless breaths, and their sewn lips trembling as they strained to produce any sound at all.

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンがサーヴィターたちの間を歩き、彼らの様子を詳しく見ていると、瞼がひらひらと動き、不安な息遣いで胸が上下し、縫い合わせられた唇が震え、何か音を発するために一生懸命努力しているのがわかった。
languages.original_text: As the Lord Captain walked between the servitors and looked at them closely, {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} could see their eyelids fluttering, their chests heaving with restless breaths, and their sewn lips trembling as they strained to produce any sound at all.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンがサーヴィターたちの間を歩き、彼らの様子を詳しく見ていると、瞼がひらひらと動き、不安な息遣いで胸が上下し、縫い合わせられた唇が震え、何か音を発するために一生懸命努力しているのがわかった。

languages.text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} remarqua plusieurs détails en examinant les servitors : leurs paupières battaient, leurs poitrines étaient secouées par leur respiration saccadée, et leurs lèvres cousues tremblaient tandis qu'ils essayaient de produire des sons.
languages.original_text: As the Lord Captain walked between the servitors and looked at them closely, {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} could see their eyelids fluttering, their chests heaving with restless breaths, and their sewn lips trembling as they strained to produce any sound at all.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} remarqua plusieurs détails en examinant les servitors : leurs paupières battaient, leurs poitrines étaient secouées par leur respiration saccadée, et leurs lèvres cousues tremblaient tandis qu'ils essayaient de produire des sons.

languages.text: 当舰长大人走到机仆中间，仔细观察他们时，那些机仆的眼皮在跳动，胸口因呼吸不畅而剧烈起伏。他们缝合的嘴唇在不断颤抖，努力发出声音。
languages.original_text: As the Lord Captain walked between the servitors and looked at them closely, {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} could see their eyelids fluttering, their chests heaving with restless breaths, and their sewn lips trembling as they strained to produce any sound at all.

traits.locale_text: 当舰长大人走到奴工中间，仔细观察他们时，那些奴工的眼皮在跳动，胸口因呼吸不畅而剧烈起伏。他们缝合的嘴唇在不断颤抖，努力发出声音。

languages.text: Mientras {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán caminaba entre los servidores y los examinaba de cerca, mi{mf|lord|lady} podía ver el parpadeo veloz de sus pestañas, las respiraciones agitadas de su pecho y el temblor de sus labios cosidos, que trataban de producir algún sonido.
languages.original_text: As the Lord Captain walked between the servitors and looked at them closely, {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} could see their eyelids fluttering, their chests heaving with restless breaths, and their sewn lips trembling as they strained to produce any sound at all.

traits.locale_text: Mientras {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán caminaba entre los servidores y los examinaba de cerca, mi{mf|lord|lady} podía ver el parpadeo veloz de sus pestañas, las respiraciones agitadas de su pecho y el temblor de sus labios cosidos, que trataban de producir algún sonido.

languages.text: Als der Lord Captain zwischen den Servitoren umherschritt und sie genau musterte, konnte {mf|seine Lordschaft|ihre Ladyschaft} sehen, wie ihre Augenlider zuckten, ihre Brustkörbe sich durch rastlose Atemzüge hoben und senkten, und ihre zusammengenähten Lippen zitterten, als sie versuchten, irgendeine Art von Geräusch zu produzieren.
languages.original_text: As the Lord Captain walked between the servitors and looked at them closely, {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} could see their eyelids fluttering, their chests heaving with restless breaths, and their sewn lips trembling as they strained to produce any sound at all.

traits.locale_text: Als der Lord Captain zwischen den Servitoren umherschritt und sie genau musterte, konnte {mf|seine Lordschaft|ihre Ladyschaft} sehen, wie ihre Augenlider zuckten, ihre Brustkörbe sich durch rastlose Atemzüge hoben und senkten, und ihre zusammengenähten Lippen zitterten, als sie versuchten, irgendeine Art von Geräusch zu produzieren.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan hizmetörlerin arasında yürürken onlara yakından bakıyor; göz kapaklarının kıpraştığını, göğüslerinin tedirgin soluklarla şişip indiğini, birbirlerine dikilmiş dudaklarının en ufak bir ses çıkarma çabasıyla titrediğini görebiliyordu.
languages.original_text: As the Lord Captain walked between the servitors and looked at them closely, {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} could see their eyelids fluttering, their chests heaving with restless breaths, and their sewn lips trembling as they strained to produce any sound at all.

traits.locale_text: Lord Kaptan hizmetörlerin arasında yürürken onlara yakından bakıyor; göz kapaklarının kıpraştığını, göğüslerinin tedirgin soluklarla şişip indiğini, birbirlerine dikilmiş dudaklarının en ufak bir ses çıkarma çabalarıyla titrediğini görebiliyordu.
